sentences.sContent: Having said this, and because of my actions, I am retiring from the sport of track and field, a sport which I deeply love.
sentences.sContent_eng: Having said this, and because of my actions, I am retiring from the sport of track and field, a sport which I deeply love.
sentences.sCn: 话已至此,由于我的行为,我决定退出田径运动, 退出我无比深爱的田径运动.

sentences.sContent: The contest marks the beginning of the Drake Relays, one of the nation‘s oldest and most prestigious track and field meets.
sentences.sContent_eng: The contest marks the beginning of the Drake Relays, one of the nation‘s oldest and most prestigious track and field meets.
sentences.sCn: 这场斗牛犬选美比赛也因此拉开了英国历史悠久、声名远扬的德雷克大学田径运动会的序幕。

sentences.sContent: I’m proud to be part of the revolution now in America whereby track and field is getting recognized and the athletes are getting better and better all the time.
sentences.sContent_eng: I’m proud to be part of the revolution now in America whereby track and field is getting recognized and the athletes are getting better and better all the time.
sentences.sCn: 美国的田径运动目前正在经历重大变革──田径运动日益受到重视，运动员也越来越强──能够在此时置身其中我深感自豪。

trans.tranOther: sports such as running and jumping
